title: Installation issue: cuda
body:
### Description

Installing cuda 10.1.243 fails on a POWER machine.  On the other hand, cuda 10.2.89 installation works (but I specifically need 10.1.X).

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install cuda@10.1.243

==> Using cached archive: /grid5000/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/b1/b198002eef010bab9e745ae98e47567c955d00cf34cc8f8d2f0a6feb810523bf                                                                                          
==> cuda: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/usr/bin/sh' '/var/spack/stage/root/spack-stage-cuda-10.1.243-rwagj62sy2hg3rx6n5tpcpcvfqbxou6u/spack-src/cuda_10.1.243_418.87.00_linux_ppc64le.run' '--silent' '--override' '--toolkit' '--installpath=/grid5000/spack/opt/spack/linux-debian10-ppc64le/gcc-8.3.0/cuda-10.1.243-rwagj62sy2hg3rx6n5tpcpcvfqbxou6u'
See build log for details:
  /var/spack/stage/root/spack-stage-cuda-10.1.243-rwagj62sy2hg3rx6n5tpcpcvfqbxou6u/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-873-c63f680d2a
* **Python:** 3.7.3
* **Platform:** linux-debian10-power8le
* **Concretizer:** original
<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->

* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5843880/spack-build-env.txt)
